posts.title: The Peacock Legend

posts.title: Etymology of Bamboo
posts.excerpt: From village memories to linguistic discoveries: exploring how 'Paambu' (snake) connects to bamboo, and the fascinating journey from Tamil 'Pirambu' to the scientific understanding of rattan and bamboo relationships.
posts.author: Ari

posts.title: Bermuda Grass
posts.excerpt: From Arugampul to Cynodon dactylon: exploring how Bermuda grass connects to Tamil culture, Pillaiyaar worship, and the fascinating etymology of 'dog-teeth' grass that plays a role in Hindu mythology and village life.
posts.author: Ari

posts.title: El And Al
posts.excerpt: Uncovering the Tamil roots of 'El' (Sun/God) and 'Al' (Moon/Dark) in global languages, from Greek Hēlios to Arabic Allah, and exploring the mysterious linguistic connections in biblical texts and cultural expressions.
posts.author: Ari

posts.title: Marsupial
posts.excerpt: From Marsupilami cartoons to Tamil etymology: discovering how 'marsupial' might derive from Tamil 'Mar' (breast) and 'Supial' (suckling animals), revealing potential ancient connections between Tamil Nadu, Africa, and Australia.
posts.author: Ari

posts.title: Translational Invariance In Detectors
posts.excerpt: A bus journey revelation: how a grasshopper's balance inspired thoughts on translational invariance in object detection algorithms, exploring the differences between two-stage and single-stage detectors.
